sim/aircraft/autopilot/radio_altimeter_s.description: Step increment for radio altimeter decision height

sim/aircraft/autopilot/preconfigured_ap_.description: 0=X-Plane custom, 1=Airliner, 2=GFC-700, 3=S-Tec 55, 4=S-Tec 55 with altitude preselect, 5=KAP-140 single axis, 6=KAP-140 dual axis, 7=KAP-140 dual axis with altitude preselect, 8=Piper Autocontrol, 9=Rockwell/Collins FCS-65

sim/aircraft/autopilot/single_axis_autop.description: Whether the autopilot is strictly single axis (bank) only.

sim/aircraft/autopilot/ah_source.description: Attitude source for the autopilot: 10 = AHRS, 11 = elec gyro, 12 = vacuum gyro, 13 = turn coordinator and absolute pressure transducer

sim/aircraft/autopilot/dg_source.description: Directional gyro source for the autopilot: 10 = AHRS, 11 = elec gyro (HSI or DG), 12 = vacuum gyro (DG)

sim/aircraft/view/acf_modeS_id.description: 24bit (0-16777215 or 0-0xFFFFFF) unique ID of the airframe. This is also known as the ADS-B "hexcode".

sim/aircraft/view/acf_descrip.description: Brief description of the plane.  Was 500 chars in older planes.

sim/aircraft/view/acf_ui_name.description: ACF name as seen in the UI

sim/aircraft/view/acf_size_z.description: Shadow size, and viewing distance size

sim/aircraft/view/acf_peX.description: Position of pilot's head relative to CG, X

sim/aircraft/view/acf_peY.description: Position of pilot's head relative to CG, Y

sim/aircraft/view/acf_peZ.description: Position of pilot's head relative to CG, Z

sim/aircraft/view/acf_Vso.description: Various speed maxima for the aircraft.

sim/aircraft/view/acf_Vfe.description: Vfe describes the aircrafts max speed with full flaps extended.

sim/aircraft/view/acf_Vno.description: Maximum structural cruising speed, not to be exceeded except in smooth air

sim/aircraft/view/acf_Vne.description: Vne is the never exceed (redline) speed

sim/aircraft/view/acf_yawstringx.description: The yaw string, that thing that no one knows how to get rid of.

sim/aircraft/view/acf_ICAO.description: ICAO code for aircraft (a string) entered by author

sim/aircraft/view/acf_door_x.description: Position of door relative to CG, latitude offset in meters

sim/aircraft/view/acf_door_y.description: Position of door relative to CG, vertical offset in meters

sim/aircraft/view/acf_door_z.description: Position of door relative to CG, longitude offset in meters

sim/aircraft/view/acf_livery_path.description: Path of current livery. Ends in dir separator. WARNING: slow dataref, don't read a lot!

sim/aircraft/electrical/num_batteries.description: The number of batteries on this plane

sim/aircraft/electrical/num_generators.description: The number of generators on this plane

sim/aircraft/electrical/num_inverters.description: The number of inverters on this plane

sim/aircraft/electrical/num_buses.description: The number of busses on this plane

sim/aircraft/electrical/essential_ties.description: Busses that can feed the essential bus. If busses 0 and 2 can feed the essential bus, this would be set to 2^0 + 2^2 = 1+4 = 5

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_prop_fail_mode.description: Where the prop pitch angle goes when the governor loses oil pressure: 0=low pitch, 1=high pitch, 2=feather, 3=start lock

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_RSC_mingov_eng.description: Minimum engine speed with governor on.

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_RSC_redline_eng_.description: Max engine speed. Array for 16 engines

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_tmax.description: The maximum thrust provided by the engine. Units are in metric. Multiply by 0.225 to get lbs thrust.

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_spooltime_jet.description: The delay in increasing the throttle for jet engines - it is the number of seconds to actuate a full advance.

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_spooltime_prop.description: The delay in increasing the throttle for prop/turboprop engines - it is the number of seconds to actuate a full advance.

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_spooltime_turbin.description: The number of seconds it takes for a free turbine to spin up from idle to full RPM.

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_fuel_intro_time_.description: The number of seconds it takes for full idle fuel flow to be reached on engine start, for propeller engines

sim/aircraft/engine/fuel_intro_time_jet.description: The number of seconds it takes for full idle fuel flow to be reached on engine start, for jet engines

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_max_ITT.description: Max internal turbine temperature the plane can have before engine failure.

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_max_EGT.description: Max exhaust gas temperature the plane can have before engine failure.

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_max_CHT.description: Max cylinder head temperature the plane can have before engine failure.

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_max_OILP.description: Max Oil Pressure the plane can have before engine failure.

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_max_OILT.description: Max Oil Temperature the plane can have before engine failure.

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_oilT_is_C.description: Oil temperature dataref reads in Celsius

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_ITT_is_C.description: Inter-turbine temperature dataref reads in Celsius

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_EGT_is_C.description: Exhaust gas temperature dataref reads in Celsius

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_CHT_is_C.description: Cylinder head temperature dataref reads in Celsius

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_max_FUELP.description: Max Fuel Pressure the plane can have before engine failure.

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_starter_torque_r.description: The ratio of the engine's maximum torque that the starter applies at its design RPM.

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_starter_max_rpm_.description: The ratio of the engine's max RPM that the starter can spin the engine up to before it loses torque.

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_APU_door_time.description: How long the APU door takes to open or close

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_APU_cooldown_tim.description: How fast the APU EGT cools down after use - influences how long the APU runs in cool down mode before it is shut down

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_APU_spoolup_time.description: How long the APU takes to spool up to 100 percent

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_APU_spooldn_time.description: How long the APU takes to spool down to 10 percent

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_APU_fuelflow_kgh.description: Fuel flow of the APU running at 100% RPM.

sim/aircraft/engine/acf_APU_fuel_src.description: Which tank the APU draws fuel from, tanks being numbered 0 to 8

sim/aircraft/prop/acf_en_type.description: Engine type - read only in v11, but you should NEVER EVER write this in v10 or earlier.  0=recip carb, 1=recip injected, 3=electric, 5=single spool jet, 6=rocket, 7=multi spool jet, 9=free turboprop, 10=fixed turboprop

sim/aircraft/prop/acf_revthrust_eq.description: Better organization to do it this way, NOTE : Used to be i8 in version 6

sim/aircraft/prop/acf_prop_gear_rat.description: Prop to engine or common power source

sim/aircraft/prop/acf_prop_dir.description: 1.0=CW, -1.0=CCW, float so we can multiply effects by floats - made NOT writable in 11.10.  YOU SHOULD NEVER WRITE THIS IN ANY VERSION OF X-PLANE.

sim/aircraft/prop/acf_num_blades.description: Float so we can multiply effects by floats

sim/aircraft/prop/acf_vertcant.description: Built into planes & helos and changed with thrust vector

sim/aircraft/parts/acf_Rafl0.description: Array of airfoil names, per part

sim/aircraft/parts/acf_semilen_JND.description: [WING] semilen of the JOINED wing segments, all JOINED SEGMENTS, for AR and CDi and ground effect, etc.

sim/aircraft/parts/acf_s.description: S for each element for foils, and FRONT, SIDE, TOP for BODIES.

sim/aircraft/parts/acf_gearcon.description: Gear param - from XP12, this is read-only

sim/aircraft/parts/acf_gear_xnodef.description: X location of the Nth gear's attach point relative to the CG, airplane coordinates.  This does not change as gear is raised.

sim/aircraft/parts/acf_gear_ynodef.description: Y location of the Nth gear's attach point relative to the CG, airplane coordinates.  This does not change as gear is raised.

sim/aircraft/parts/acf_gear_znodef.description: Z location of the Nth gear's attach point relative to the CG, airplane coordinates.  This does not change as gear is raised.

sim/aircraft/bodies/acf_fuse_cd_array.description: [PART] Drag coefficient for all parts. From V12, only body parts (56 to 95) are accessible.

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_RSC_mingov_prp.description: Minimum prop speed with governor on, radians/second

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_trq_max_prp.description: NOTE : This is now the same as acf_trq_max_en in v7

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_hstb_trim_up.description: The maximum degrees deflection up for a horizontal stabilizer that moves during trim

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_hstb_trim_dn.description: The maximum degrees deflection down for a horizontal stabilizer that moves during trim

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_takeoff_trim.description: The trim position for takeoff expressed as a ratio, 1 = max up trim, -1 = max down trim.

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_min_trim_elev.description: Maximum nose-down trim, expressed as a ratio of maximum nose-down elevator deflection

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_max_trim_elev.description: Maximum nose-up trim, expressed as a ratio of maximum nose-up elevator deflection

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_elev_trim_spee.description: The speed of trim time, expressed as a ratio, where 1.0 means it takes 20 seconds to fully move trim from one extreme to the other.  2.0 means trim is twice as fast.

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_elev_tab.description: The amount of elevator deflection (as a ratio of max) induced by the aerodynamic effect of static trim tabs.

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_min_trim_ailn.description: Maximum aileron downward trim, expressed as a ratio of maximum aileron downward travel

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_max_trim_ailn.description: Maximum aileron upward trim, expressed as a ratio of maximum aileron upward travel

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_ailn_trim_spee.description: The speed of trim time, expressed as a ratio, where 1.0 means it takes 20 seconds to fully move trim from one extreme to the other.  2.0 means trim is twice as fast.

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_ailn_tab.description: The amount of aileron deflection (as a ratio of max) induced by the aerodynamic effect of static trim tabs.

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_min_trim_rudd.description: Maximum rudder left trim, expressed as a ratio of maximum rudder left travel

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_max_trim_rudd.description: Maximum rudder right trim, expressed as a ratio of maximum rudder right travel

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_rudd_trim_spee.description: The speed of trim time, expressed as a ratio, where 1.0 means it takes 20 seconds to fully move trim from one extreme to the other.  2.0 means trim is twice as fast.

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_rudd_tab.description: The amount of rudder deflection (as a ratio of max) induced by the aerodynamic effect of static trim tabs.

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_elev_def_time.description: Enter 0.0 to be able to deflect the controls as fast as the pilot can move the stick or the art stab system can command a deflection. If the plane has a hydraulic system and a max rate of control deflection, though, enter how long it takes to go from center to fully-deflected.

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_ailn_def_time.description: Enter 0.0 to be able to deflect the controls as fast as the pilot can move the stick or the art stab system can command a deflection. If the plane has a hydraulic system and a max rate of control deflection, though, enter how long it takes to go from center to fully-deflected.

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_rudd_def_time.description: Enter 0.0 to be able to deflect the controls as fast as the pilot can move the stick or the art stab system can command a deflection. If the plane has a hydraulic system and a max rate of control deflection, though, enter how long it takes to go from center to fully-deflected.

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_elev_trim_time.description: The total time taken for the elevator trim to go from one extreme to the other.

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_ailn_trim_time.description: The total time taken for the aileron trim to go from one extreme to the other.

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_rudd_trim_time.description: The total time taken for the rudder trim to go from one extreme to the other.

sim/aircraft/controls/acf_hyd_PTU_type.description: The PTU can power one hydraulic system from the other with no fluid transfer. Aircraft is euipped with: 0=No PTU, 1=unidirectional left-to-right, 2=unidirectional right-to-left, 3=bidirectional PTU

sim/aircraft/gear/acf_gear_retract.description: Are any of the gear on this plane retractable.  We strongly recommend you DO NOT write to this dataref.

sim/aircraft/weight/acf_cgY_original.description: The ORIGINAL reference point in PM in feet.

sim/aircraft/weight/acf_cgZ_original.description: The ORIGINAL reference point in PM in feet.

sim/aircraft/weight/acf_Jxx_unitmass.description: Moment of inertia per kg for the aircraft as a whole

sim/aircraft/weight/acf_Jyy_unitmass.description: Moment of inertia per kg for the aircraft as a whole

sim/aircraft/weight/acf_Jzz_unitmass.description: Moment of inertia per kg for the aircraft as a whole

sim/aircraft/weight/acf_stations_ref_x.description: N'th payload station's X arm to acft origin

sim/aircraft/weight/acf_stations_ref_y.description: N'th payload station's Y arm to acft origin

sim/aircraft/weight/acf_stations_ref_z.description: N'th payload station's Z arm to acft origin

sim/aircraft/weight/acf_m_station_max.description: N'th payload stations's maximum weight, as specified by author (station can be overloaded by user)

sim/aircraft/weight/acf_m_fuel_tot.description: Weight of total fuel - appears to be in lbs.

sim/aircraft/specialcontrols/acf_winshie.description: 1=default factor for v11 and older aircraft. Less than 1 for slower de-ice, more than 1 for faster de-ice

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_stab_delinc_to.description: Amount the stab moves in trim automatically as you go to redline (zero at zero airspeed)

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_gear_cyc_time.description: Gear cycle time... different for different gear in some cases, NOTE : This used to be f5 in v6

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_gear_steers.description: This gear turns with rudder input - writable until v10

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_tank_X.description: Fuel tank locations when empty - was dim 3 in XP8 and earlier

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_tank_Y.description: Fuel tank locations when empty - was dim 3 in XP8 and earlier

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_tank_Z.description: Fuel tank locations when empty - was dim 3 in XP8 and earlier

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_tank_X_full.description: Fuel tank locations when full - was dim 3 in XP8 and earlier

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_tank_Y_full.description: Fuel tank locations when full - was dim 3 in XP8 and earlier

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_tank_Z_full.description: Fuel tank locations when full - was dim 3 in XP8 and earlier

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_tank_rat.description: Fuel tank ratio per tank -- was dim 3 in xp 8 and earlier

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_stall_warn_alp.description: Alpha of stall warning... user must specify since warning different for different planes.

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_feathered_pitc.description: Let people decide feathered pitch to get right for their plane.

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_o2_bottle_cap_.description: Capacity of the crew oxygen reserve

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_flap_ptch.description: Flap actuation... like for really high-lift guys still manuevering at low speeds.

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_phase_tvect_ou.description: Phase thrust-vectoring maneuvering in as we go from 90 to 0, going from hover with puffers to F-22 dogfight

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_brake_co.description: Coefficient of static friction for braking and side-loading (steering)

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_drive_by_wire.description: Engine always runs at optimum mixture... like FADEC or auto conversions.

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_num_tanks.description: Number fuel tanks - as of 860, all planes have 9 tanks and ratios for each - ratio of 0.0 means tank is not used

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_eng_mass.description: Mass of each engine for distribution and loss on engine separation. NOTE : This used to be f57 in v6

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_phase_tvect_ou.description: Phase thrust-vectoring maneuvering out as we go from 90 to 0 deg tvec, going from maneuver-to-hover to regular thrust

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_auto_trimEQ.description: Auto-trim out any flight loads... numerous planes have this.

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_flaps_with_gea.description: The Jatviggen does flaps with gear automatically

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_flaps_with_vec.description: Bring in the flaps with thrust vector

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_num_thrustpoin.description: Number props can be different than number of engines - * This can crash Xplane, use at your own risk.  Not writeable in v10.

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_cus_rnd_mirror.description: Mirror the angles on even-number engines on the twins

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_cus_rnd_label.description: Draw labels on the instruments... many do not label the scales, only draw digital numbers.

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_vectarmY.description: Prop needs offset in z and y from the pivot point... z for V-22, y for motorgliders

sim/aircraft/overflow/acf_hide_prop_at_9.description: For those motorgliders or prop/jet combos or what have you that hide their props when not in use

sim/flightmodel/parts/axil_force.description: 73 [WING] for data output, for the entire flying surface

sim/flightmodel/parts/flap_def.description: 73 [WING] with flap setting, and then variation with pitch and roll input, on a 4 wing plane, with flaps on every wing, some going up and down with pitch input, we better find the flap def on each surface!

sim/flightmodel/parts/flap2_def.description: 56 [WING] with flap setting, and then variation with pitch and roll input, on a 4 wing plane, with flaps on every wing, some going up and down with pitch input, we better find the flap def on each surface!

sim/flightmodel/parts/elev_cont_def.description: 73 [WING] different for each part since def may be positive on a canard and negative on an aft wing... ON THE SAME PLANE AT THE SAME TIME!

sim/flightmodel/parts/elev_trim_def.description: 73 [WING] different for each part since def may be positive on a canard and negative on an aft wing... ON THE SAME PLANE AT THE SAME TIME!

sim/flightmodel/parts/rudd_cont_def.description: 73 [WING] different for each part since def may be positive on top vstab and neg on the bottom one.... ON THE SAME PLANE AT THE SAME TIME!

sim/flightmodel/parts/rudd2_cont_def.description: 56 [WING] different for each part since def may be positive on top vstab and neg on the bottom one.... ON THE SAME PLANE AT THE SAME TIME!

sim/operation/g430/G430_is_vloc.description: If true, vertical guidance is a glide slope - otherwise it is a GPS vertical guidance indicator.  Comes from the physical units!

sim/operation/misc/frame_rate_period.description: The frame rate period. Use the reciprocal to get the frame rate (e.g. 1/mnw.prd).  Writable via override_timestep in 11.10

sim/operation/misc/time_ratio.description: How close XP time matches real time. Ideal ratio is 1.  NOTE: in 930 and later time ratio is always 1.0.

sim/operation/override/override_joystick.description: Override control of the joystick deflections (overrides stick, yoke, pedals, keys, mouse, and auto-coordination)

sim/operation/override/override_artstab.description: Override control of the artificial stability system

sim/operation/override/override_flightco.description: Override all parts of the flight system at once

sim/operation/override/override_planepat.description: Override position updates of this plane

sim/operation/override/override_plane_ai.description: Override the AI's control of the plane via the autopilot

sim/operation/override/override_nav_head.description: Override raw heading flown by nav (for GPS that fly by roll commands)

sim/operation/override/override_camera.description: Override camera control.  NOTE: DO NOT USE, USE XPLMCAMERA!!

sim/operation/override/override_joystick.description: Override just heading (yaw) control (disables auto-coordination). Use yoke_heading_ratio.
Override just pitch control. Use yoke_pitch_ratio.
Override just roll control. Use yoke_roll_ratio.
Override just heading (yaw) control for copilot input (disables auto-coordination). Use yoke_heading_ratio_copilot.
Override just pitch control for copilot input. Use yoke_pitch_ratio_copilot.
Override just roll control for copilot input. Use yoke_roll_ratio_copilot.

sim/operation/override/override_throttle.description: Override the throttles. Use ENGN_thro_use to control them.

sim/operation/override/override_prop_pit.description: Override the prop pitch.  Use POINT_pitch_deg_use to edit.

sim/operation/override/override_prop_mod.description: Override the prop mode.  Use ENGN_propmode to edit.

sim/operation/override/override_mixture.description: Override the mixture controls.  Use ENGN_mixt to edit.

sim/operation/override/override_groundpl.description: Override ground interactions (see sim/flightmodel/ground) - in v11 this was gone until 11.30.

sim/operation/override/override_fms_adva.description: Override the FMS going to the next waypoint.

sim/operation/override/override_itt_egt.description: Overrides engine temp vars sim/flightmodel/engine/ENGN_EGT_c and ENGN_ITT_c

sim/operation/override/override_cht_oilt.description: Overrides engine temp vars sim/flightmodel/engine/ENGN_CHT_c and ENGN_oilT_c

sim/operation/override/override_ias.description: Overrides indicated airspeed dataref, so it is no longer update 1:1 from calibrated airspeed. Plugin can introduce installation error to indicated airspeed

sim/operation/override/override_gs.description: Overrides groundspeed indication on GPS - groundspeed by default is a 2D speed, the pythag of movement in East and South axis. If you want something else, turn on this override and write to the indicator.

sim/operation/override/override_control_.description: Overrides individual control surfaces, e.g. sim/flightmodel/controls/lail1def

sim/operation/override/override_engines.description: Overrides all engine calculations - write to LMN and g_nrml/side/axil.

sim/operation/override/override_torque_m.description: Overrides all engine calculations but not the prop - write the torque your motor generates while the prop will still be simulated by X-Plane

sim/operation/override/override_forces.description: Overrides all force calculations - write to LMN and g_nrml/side/axil.

sim/operation/override/override_wing_for.description: Overrides all wing calculations - write to aero LMN and g_nrml/side/axil.

sim/operation/override/override_engine_f.description: Overrides all engine calculations - write to prop LMN and g_nrml/side/axil.

sim/operation/override/override_gear_for.description: Overrides all gear calculations - write to gear LMN and g_nrml/side/axil.

sim/operation/override/override_boats.description: Overrides speed, heading, and rocking of boats. index 0=carrier, 1=frigate

sim/operation/override/override_clouds.description: Overrides building and drawing of clouds as well as white-out-in-cloud effects

sim/operation/override/override_wheel_st.description: Overrides the steering of individual gear from tiller/rudder.

sim/operation/override/override_airport_.description: Overrides when the airport lights go on and off.

sim/operation/override/override_fuel_sys.description: Turns off transfer and dump and lets the plugin decide if the engine gets fuel

sim/operation/override/override_TCAS.description: Lets third party add-ons write to the TCAS source data array so you can have plugin controlled instances as TCAS targets. Only writeable by the plugin that has the AI planes acquired.

sim/operation/override/override_multipla.description: Lets third party add-ons turn off X-Plane's map layer that shows icons for other planes. This allows the plugin to supply their own custom map layer and not conflict with X-Plane. Only writeable by the plugin that has also set override_TCAS.

sim/operation/override/override_toe_brak.description: Gives plugins control of sim/cockpit2/controls/left_brake_ratio and right_brake_ratio

sim/operation/override/override_timestep.description: Overrides the sim's time step.  when enabled, xtim.prd_sim, sim/operation/misc/frame_rate_period is plugin-writable

sim/operation/override/override_pressuri.description: Override the sims pressurization control, so a plugin can control cabin pressurization itself.

sim/operation/override/override_oxygen_s.description: Override the sims crew and passenger oxygen system, so a plugin can control the oxygen system itself

sim/operation/override/override_slung_lo.description: Override slung load size calculation - makes sim/flightmodel/misc/jett_size writable.

sim/operation/override/override_wake_tur.description: Overrides and turns off X-plane's simulation of wake turbulence

sim/operation/prefs/startup_running.description: Start up with the plane running?

sim/operation/prefs/warn_overspeed.description: Warn if we exceed max airframe speed

sim/operation/prefs/warn_overgforce.description: Warn if we exceed max g-forces on aircraft

sim/operation/prefs/warn_overspeed_flaps.description: Warn if we exceed max flap extended speed

sim/operation/prefs/warn_overspeed_gear.description: Warn if we exceed max gear deployed speed

sim/operation/prefs/reset_on_crash.description: On crash, do we reset the AC to the nearest airport? - gone in v11, read only dref returns false for compatibility.

sim/operation/prefs/warn_nonobvious_stuf.description: Show text warning for otherwise hard to see things like carb-icing?

sim/operation/prefs/ai_flies_aircraft.description: Controls whether the AI controls the user's plane

sim/operation/prefs/using_experimental_f.description: True if the user has enabled the experimental flight model. In 12.0 returns 0 because 12.0 does not have an experimental FM - may change in future versions.

sim/operation/prefs/misc/has_lua_alloc.description: Returns true if the sim provides a low-mem lua allocator via inter-plugin messaging.

sim/operation/sound/has_sound.description: Does this machine have sound hardware that X-Plane understands?

sim/operation/sound/has_speech_synth.description: Does this machine have speech synth capabilities?

sim/operation/sound/speech_on.description: Is speech synth on (set by user)

sim/operation/sound/exterior_volume_rati.description: Volume level for external sound effects (like engine and prop), ratio from 0 (silent) to 1 (max loudness)

sim/operation/sound/interior_volume_rati.description: Volume level for internal sound effects (like warnings and cautions), ratio from 0 (silent) to 1 (max loudness)

sim/operation/sound/pilot_volume_ratio.description: Volume level for the pilot talking (on missions), ratio from 0 (silent) to 1 (max loudness)

sim/operation/sound/copilot_volume_ratio.description: Volume level for the copilot talking (on missions), ratio from 0 (silent) to 1 (max loudness)

sim/operation/sound/radio_volume_ratio.description: Volume level for the com radios, ratio from 0 (silent) to 1 (max loudness)

sim/operation/sound/radio_copilot_audio_.description: Volume level for the com radios through the copilot audio panel, ratio from 0 (silent) to 1 (max loudness)

sim/operation/sound/enviro_volume_ratio.description: Volume level for environmental sound effects (thunder, rain, wind), ratio from 0 (silent) to 1 (max loudness)

sim/operation/sound/ui_volume_ratio.description: Volume level for UI sound effects (clicks), ratio from 0 (silent) to 1 (max loudness)

sim/operation/sound/engine_volume_ratio.description: Volume level for engine sound effects, ratio from 0 (silent) to 1 (max loudness)

sim/operation/sound/prop_volume_ratio.description: Volume level for propeller sound effects, ratio from 0 (silent) to 1 (max loudness)

sim/operation/sound/ground_volume_ratio.description: Volume level for ground contact effects, ratio from 0 (silent) to 1 (max loudness)

sim/operation/sound/weather_volume_ratio.description: Volume level for weather sound effects, ratio from 0 (silent) to 1 (max loudness)

sim/operation/sound/warning_volume_ratio.description: Volume level for warning systems, ratio from 0 (silent) to 1 (max loudness)

sim/operation/sound/fan_volume_ratio.description: Volume level for the avionics fan, ratio from 0 (silent) to 1 (max loudness)

sim/operation/sound/inside_ratio.description: 1 if we are in this space, 0 if outside, and a fraction as we transition through the borer region

sim/operation/sound/inside_any.description: True if the camera is inside ANY of the defined sound volumes for the aircraft.

sim/operation/sound/users_canopy_open_ra.description: Canopy position: 0 = closed, 1 = open - these ALWAYS reflect the USER's plane (even when used on an AI) so they are appropriate for SOUND MIXING.

sim/operation/sound/users_door_open_rati.description: How open is the door, 0 = closed, 1 = open - these ALWAYS reflect the USER's plane (even when used on an AI) so they are appropriate for SOUND MIXING.

sim/operation/sound/radios_are_copilot.description: Whether the headset is plugged into the pilot's or copilot's audio jack.

sim/operation/windows/system_window.description: X-Plane's system native window as an int (either an HWND or WindowRef pre 102)

sim/operation/windows/system_window_64.description: X-Plane's system native window as an array of two ints - low 32 bits first (either an HWND or WindowRef)

sim/test/test_float.description: This test dataref is used internally for testing our models

sim/time/total_running_time_sec.description: Total time the sim has been up

sim/time/total_flight_time_sec.description: Total time since the flight got reset by something

sim/time/timer_elapsed_time_sec.description: Total time elapsed on the timer

sim/time/use_system_time.description: Use system date and time for local time

sim/time/paused.description: Is the sim paused?  Use cmd keys to change this.

sim/time/sim_speed.description: The multiplier for real-time...1 = realtime, 2 = 2x, 0 = paused, etc.

sim/time/sim_speed_actual.description: The actual time-speed increase the sim has achieved - takes into account fps limiting.

sim/time/sim_speed_actual_ogl.description: The actual time-speed increase the sim has achieved - takes into account fps limiting and time dilation if fps<19.

sim/time/ground_speed.description: The multiplier on ground speed, for faster travel via double-distance

sim/time/ground_speed_flt.description: The multiplier on ground speed, as float value, for faster travel via double-distance

sim/time/hobbs_time.description: elapsed time on the Hobbs meter

sim/time/is_in_replay.description: true if we are in replay mode, false if we are flying

sim/time/framerate_period.description: Smoothed time to draw each full sim frame in seconds.  This is 1.0 / FPS.

sim/time/gpu_time_per_frame_sec_approx.description: An approximate estimate of GPU time spent per each frame in seconds.  Note that it can be RADICALLY wrong if anything is done wrong by plugins or the driver is weird.  It's for entertainment value only!!!

sim/version/sim_build_string.description: The date and time that this x-plane was built.

sim/version/xplm_build_string.description: The date and time that the XPLM DLL was built.

sim/version/xplanee_internal_version.description: The internal build number - it is a unique integer that always increases and is unique with each beta.  For example, 10.51b5 might be 105105.  There is no guarantee that the build numbe (last 2 digits) are in sync with the official beta number.

sim/version/xplane_internal_version.description: The internal build number - it is a unique integer that always increases and is unique with each beta.  For example, 10.51b5 might be 105105.  There is no guarantee that the build numbe (last 2 digits) are in sync with the official beta number.

sim/weapons/weapon_count.description: The number of weapons available via datarefs.

sim/weapons/type.description: (V10 style!) For the geometry we scan right into the acf structure unused array-spaces.

sim/weapons/free_flyer.description: (V10 style!) Weapon can go fly free...

sim/weapons/action_mode.description: (V10 style!) 0 = In carriage/still in the gun/reloaded, 1 = firing, and 2 = destroyed

sim/weapons/x_wpn_att.description: This allows us to use our drawing, smoothing, editing, s-t, normal-vector, plotting, etc.

sim/weapons/y_wpn_att.description: Code to do the weapons as well as everything else.

sim/weapons/added_mass.description: Mass in addition to ammo... like the gun itself, and bomb racks.

sim/weapons/total_weapon_mass_max.description: Warhead and casing, fuel and tank

sim/weapons/fuel_warhead_mass_max.description: Remember we can have drop tanks

sim/weapons/mis_cone_width.description: For heat or radar-guided, you must keep the target within this cone to track him

sim/weapons/gun_del_psi_deg_max.description: Aimable guns for c130 Spectre, etc

sim/weapons/gun_del_the_deg_max.description: Aimable guns for c130 Spectre, etc

sim/weapons/del_the.description: Delta to target, for data output

sim/weapons/time_point.description: Speed and dist to target for data output

sim/weapons/next_bull_time.description: For guns, this is the next fire time

sim/weapons/firing.description: 0 = not firing, 1 = firing (This is the launcher that the wpn is attached to, for actual wpn status, also check action_mode and/or next_bull_time)

sim/weather/cloud_type[0].description:
The type of clouds for this cloud layer. Currently there are only 3 cloud layers, 0, 1 or 2. Cloud types:

Clear = 0, High Cirrus = 1, Scattered = 2, Broken = 3, Overcast = 4, Stratus = 5 (740 and newer)

sim/weather/aircraft/altimeter_temperatu.description: How much a correctly set barometric altimeter differs from the actual altitude due to non-standard temperature at the altitude the user plane is flying.

sim/weather/region/weather_source.description: What system is currently controlling the weather. 0 = Preset, 1 = Real Weather, 2 = Controlpad, 3 = Plugin.

sim/weather/region/update_immediately.description: If this is true, any weather region changes EXCEPT CLOUDS will take place immediately instead of at the next update interval (currently 60 seconds).

sim/world/boat/velocity_msc.description: Velocity of the boat in meters per second in its current direction.  Index 0=carrier,1=frigate, writable using override_boats.

sim/world/boat/x_mtr.description: X Position of the boat in meters in the local coordinate OpenGL coordinate system. Index 0=carrier,1=frigate, writable using override_boats.

sim/world/boat/y_mtr.description: Y Position of the boat in meters in the local coordinate OpenGL coordinate system. Index 0=carrier,1=frigate, writable using override_boats.

sim/world/boat/z_mtr.description: Z Position of the boat in meters in the local coordinate OpenGL coordinate system. Index 0=carrier,1=frigate, writable using override_boats.

sim/world/boat/heading_deg.description: Heading of the boat in degrees from true north. Index 0=carrier,1=frigate, writable using override_boats.

sim/world/boat/pitch_frequency_hz.description: Frequency at which the boat pitches up and down. Index 0=carrier,1=frigate, writable using override_boats.

sim/world/boat/pitch_amplitude_deg_mtr.description: Degrees that the boat pitches up for each meter of wave height. Index 0=carrier,1=frigate, writable using override_boats.

sim/world/boat/roll_frequency_hz.description: Frequency at which the boat rolls from side to side.  Index 0=carrier,1=frigate, writable using override_boats.

sim/world/boat/roll_amplitude_deg_mtr.description: degrees that the boat rolls from side to side for each meter of wave height.  Index 0=carrier,1=frigate, writable using override_boats.

sim/world/boat/frigate_ILS_offset_x_mtr.description: X position of the frigate ILS transmitter (in coordinates of the OBJ model)

sim/world/boat/frigate_ILS_offset_z_mtr.description: Z position of the frigate ILS transmitter (in coordinates of the OBJ model)

sim/world/boat/carrier_deck_height_mtr.description: Deck height of the carrier (in coordinates of the OBJ model)

sim/world/boat/carrier_ILS_offset_x_mtr.description: X position of the carrier ILS transmitter (in coordinates of the OBJ model)

sim/world/boat/carrier_ILS_offset_z_mtr.description: Z position of the carrier ILS transmitter (in coordinates of the OBJ model)

sim/world/boat/carrier_approach_heading.description: Relative heading of the approach path from the carrier's heading

sim/world/boat/carrier_catshot_status.description: 0=no cat shot set up,1=cat shot waiting to launch,2=in progress

sim/world/winch/winch_ramp_up_time_sec.description: How long it takes the winch to reach maximum speed for a glider winch take-off.

sim/world/winch/winch_initial_length.description: The initial length of cable for a winch takeoff.

sim/world/winch/winch_max_bhp.description: The maximum horsepower the winch can deliver reeling in the cable. Cable speed will decay with higher force on the cable to not exceed this limit.

sim/aircraft2/metadata/is_ultralight.description: 1 if the vehicle is categorized as an ultralight, 0 if it is not.
